platformWallpapersPackList.platformWallpapersPackDescription: The pack contains characters, game contents and splendid wallpapers with brand logo for each devices. Originated from fagnerpc/Alekfull-NX on GitHub. Mentioned by oby2 in Discord.
The pack contains colorful yet simple wallpapers of physical looks for each devices. Originated from viking on launchbox. Modified by UsagiShade, indexing by magneticchen for Daijishō.
The pack contains 3d models for each devices. Originated from DrOctoroc on deviantart.com. Mentioned by MonkoftheFunk in Discord.
The pack contains abstract, flat and colorful wallpapers with brand logo for nintendo devices. Originated from kenji-cosplay-studio on deviantart.com. Mentioned by Diabolus in Discord.
This pack will set all your wallpaper to mount niitaka. Niitaka (新高) is the highest mountain in Taiwan at 3,952 m above sea level. "Was" the tallest mountain in the Japanese Empire.
A platform wallpapers pack template contains only single wallpaper of retro futuristic wallpaper.
The pack contains wallpapers of characters from systems with transparent backgrounds. Originated from launchbox theme. Created by Jetup13. Originated from NES-Box for ES by KALEL1981.

The pack contains only green lines sketch of physical looks for each device's controllers. Originated from viking on launchbox. Discovered by Diabolus, modified by MonkoftheFunk, indexing by magneticchen for Daijishō.
The pack contains red-themed backgrounds, devices and titles wallpapers for each platforms. It's a platform wallpapers pack for Daijishō made by Retro Devils.
The pack contains of wallpapers of systems with transparent backgrounds. Originated from launchbox theme. Packed by Jetup13.
